title: Ep. 703 - Bhide's Grave Mistake - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Bhide has ended up making a huge mistake that is by breaking the gift that was sent by Sundar for Daya and Jetha. It was a precious gift. What will happen? Watch to find out!

title: Ep. 704 - Jetha's Parcel - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Jethalal receives a parcel and Babita brings it to her house. While getting the parcel back from Bhide's house, Iyer by mistake drops it and it breaks. They try fixing it and it is sent to Taarak's house. But, it finally reaches Jetha's house.

title: Ep. 705 - The Mishap - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: While Jetha is about to open the parcel, it slips from his hand when Tapu enters. Jetha doesn't tell Sundar about the parcel thinking of his reaction.

title: Ep. 706 - Who Is At Fault? - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Sodhi comes and confesses that he broke the idol.  In the meantime, Bhide enters and confesses. All of them go to Jetha's house and explain the same to him.

title: Ep. 707 - Daya Has A Request - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Daya asks Jetha to take a proper bath. Later, the ladies of Gokuldham perform a puja. In view of Navratri. Daya puts forth a request to Jetha to call Falguni Pathak.

title: Ep. 708 - A Surprise In Gokuldham - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Jetha is worried as he isn't sure if Falguni Pathak will show up. The residents are excited about her arrival. But, Jetha questions Daya on raising expectations. Watch to find out the surprise.

title: Ep. 709 - Dancing To Falguni's Tunes - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: As a surprise, Falguni arrives in Gokuldham which makes everybody happy. Later, she starts singing songs and everybody joins along and dances.

title: Ep. 710 - Tapu Sena Presents A Plan - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: After the first night of Navratri, Tapu Sena have come up with a new plan. They call and ask everybody to assemble in haste. Bhide and the others like the plan and agree for the same.

title: Ep. 711 - Jetha's Dream - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: The plan is on and the designated person is called for the work. Later, when Jetha is asleep he gets Raavan is his dream asking him to stop the proceedings.

title: Ep. 712 - The Worry Continues - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Jetha is still worried about his dream and expresses the same to his family and Taarak. Taarak calls for a meeting where everybody is hysterical of the situation and questions Jetha's idea.

title: Ep. 713 - The Revelation - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: The residents of Gokuldham force Jethalal to lit the 'Raavan''s idol. But, he refuses to do it because of the dream he had. Later, the residents witness something they haven't seen before.

title: Ep. 714 - A Lesson Learnt - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Its yet again Jetha's dream which stops him from lighting the Raavan idol. He finally refuses and says that he wouldn't do it and gives valid reasons for the same.

title: Ep. 715 - Good News For Daya - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Daya calls over her friends to tell the good news. She tells that Falguni Pathak had called her and has given her some passes. The ladies refuse to go with her and find a reason to avoid it.

title: Ep. 716 - A Planned Surprise - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Madhavi, Babita, and others decide to surprise Daya in the program that she is going to. Bhide organizes a conference call to decide what has to be done. Finally, they arrive at the program but don't have any tickets.

title: Ep. 717 - Will The Surprise Be Ruined? - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
shortDesc: Sodhi, Bhide don't get the tickets for the program and are stranded outside the gate. Meanwhile, Taarak and Jetha's family comes over. Champaklal spots them and their surprise goes in vain.
